posts.content:
I have looked at these, but the cost is far greater and would make the dock very expensive overall. So I have stuck with the known and trusted format of 3.5mm jack plug/socket, which apple still use on all their docks even for the iPhone 6 (although its at the back).It also does give the phone incredible stability in the dock.

thanks for sending the comment through I'm always open to new ideas and pointers as it easy to be so close to something you design that you can miss the obvious!

Mark

Hi all,

The iPhone 5 & 6 docks are now finally ready!

please PM me if you would like one with your address details and I'll reply with bank details for payment

quick summary again of what you get (also see picture above)
you will receive the iPhone dock ready to fit to your existing ashtray with all parts accept the lightning cable with full instructions on how to assemble/fit.

cost including postage £35

I will be posting this item onto the main for sale page by the end of the week!

look forward to hearing from you
Well mine arrived this morning, still to fit but it looks like a quality piece of kit and the instructions are something else, very easy to read and added bonus of photos, thanks

Thanks Ziggy, nice to have peoples first impressions on the product!

I tried to make it as simple and clear as possible on how to fit this to accommodate every skill level, as it really is something anyone can fit!

happy fitting

Thanks
Mark

I have a complete ashtray dock ready to go that would probably suit rat look van or could be painted to match your van interior or simplest way would be to just use your existing ashtray lid!

It is currently to built to suit an IPhone 6 but can be changed to an iPhone 5 if required

So just a case of drop it in your dash and connect it up!

(Note: I do not usually supply the lightning cables in these kits but throwing this one in for free!) it is a brand new cable, but not a genuine apple one although it seems to work fine, so up to you if you want to replace it with an original one!

£65 posted

Pictures below:

author.location: Mayrhofen, Austria (but my for sale bits are in the UK)

posts.content: If I wanted them shipping over to Austria, would you be able to do that ? Are they ready to ship (iphone 6)

Hi NikC
Yes they are available to post and will be happy to send to Austria. However the price covers the cost of postage to UK, so will need to check how much it will be to ship to Austria and may have to ask you pay any extra if necessary. Once I get home from work I'll have a look & let you know.
Many thanks
Mark/Tracy

I Will be at Dubs at the Hall this weekend for anyone wanting a dock or to see them in the flesh.

I'll have posters in the windows of my van so easy to find me!

author.location: Mayrhofen, Austria (but my for sale bits are in the UK)

posts.content:
Mine arrived yesterday ... what a great job you've on these, thanks !

(will fit it at the weekend).

Fitted mine the other night, could not have been easier, tested and working, will be using in anger on the way to DATH, nice piece of kit, thanks.

Tip, dry test to check the lead is high enough to make a good connection, thought it was seated ok until I connected to the power source, cable was just a bit to low down, unfortunately the ash tray was fitted back in by then, easily sorted though, properly due to my phone case.

Glad you like it, and it all up and running! (it is difficult to specify how high to put the lightning connector before tightenening due to different case sizes)

hope to see it in your van the weekend when I'm there!

thanks for the feedback!

Mark

I Will be at V-Dub island from Thursday to Sunday this week for anyone wanting a dock or to see them first hand.

will have limited stock for the show though
